law.catch_line: Procedures for solid waste management conflict resolution.

text.section: The Department for Local Government shall adopt administrative regulations to implement the provisions of subsection (1) of this section.
Nothing in this section shall be construed to abridge any rights or remedies provided by KRS Chapters 109 and 224, or at common law.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 136, effective July 15, 2010; and ch. 117, sec. 11, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 72, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 57, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1991 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 10, effective February 26, 1991.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/2010). This section was amended by 2010 Ky. Acts chs. 24 and 117, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
